title: Summon tech to address judicial delays
description: Indian judiciary can move towards accessible, efficient, and timely justice for all by incorporating measures that embrace artificial intelligence.
content:
By Anand Desai

title: How AI Is Transforming the Future of Presentation Design
description: Every great idea deserves to be seen — not buried in cluttered slides. Yet for most professionals, building a presentation takes longer than delivering the message itself. Adjusting fonts, aligning visuals, and choosing colors can eat up hours. Now, artificial intelligence (AI) is changing that. AI makes presentation design faster, easier, and more professional. title: Global Markets Sway Amid U.S. Shutdown Hopes and AI Fluctuations
description: MSCI's global equities index experienced gains as investors anticipated an end to the U.S. government shutdown. Meanwhile, the U.S. dollar weakened due to labor market concerns, and artificial intelligence stocks saw volatility. Oil and gold prices rose slightly amid economic uncertainty.
content: MSCI's global equities index saw an uptick on Tuesday as investors paused following Monday's significant gains. This rise was tied to hopes for a resolution to the ongoing U.S. government shutdown, despite exorbitant valuations in the tech sector tem... [680 chars]

title: The rise of Yann LeCun, the 65-year-old NYU professor who is planning to leave Mark Zuckerberg's highly paid team at Meta to launch his own AI startup
description: LeCun is a Turing Award winner and considered one of the pioneers of modern artificial intelligence.
content:
LeCun, 65, joined Facebook in December 2013 as the founding director of Fundamental AI Research, known as FAIR. He remains a Silver Professor at New York University, where he has taught since 2003.
